title: Store
description: A place or property (physical or digital) where goods or services are sold, distributed or subscribed. Includes a store with in a larger store.

id.title: Store Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the store.

name.title: Store Name
name.description: The common name of the store.

parentStoreId.title: Parent Store Id
parentStoreId.description: Id of the store this store is contained or closely related to, e.g a pharmacy inside a supermarket store.

location.title: Location
location.description: The perminant physical location of the store.

generalEmail.title: General Email
generalEmail.description: The general email address for the store.

dmaId.title: Designated Market Area
dmaId.description: The Nielsen Media Research designated market area the store serves.

market.title: Market
market.description: Sales organization  market area the store serves.

openingDate.title: Original Opening Date
openingDate.description: The date that the store first opened for business, even if the address changed, the area served remained the same.

remodelDate.title: Last Remodel Date
remodelDate.description: The date that the store last had a significant remodel.

model.title: Store Model
model.description: The model or type of store. Examples: online, express, micro, kiosk, partner, superstore, mobile, distribution center.

features.title: Store Features
features.description: List of non-standard features that the store has, such as product demo areas, e.g Apple displays, Bike Shop etc.

productCategories.title: Product Categories
productCategories.description: List of product categories this store supports that directly correlate with the categories in the Product schema, e.g cloths, womenâ€™s shoes.
